summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Description Context Feature. All requested functionality working perfectly: Dashboard loading, molecule generation (aspirin), Source Description card display with correct content and timestamp, history interaction, and card updates when selecting different history items.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about WebGL performance and GPU stall messages
design_issues.impact: No functional impact, just console noise during 3D rendering

passed_tests: Source Description card appearance in 3D viewer bottom area
Timestamp visibility with calendar icon (Dec 22, 6:25 AM format)
Sidebar history interaction and item selection
Source Description card updates when clicking different history items
Card content changes from 'aspirin' to 'caffeine in 1223 345' correctly
3D viewer remains functional during card interactions
Card overlay positioning (z-index and visual overlay confirmed)
